alert.note: Alert for Allen; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 7:44PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS... EASTERN CALCASIEU AND SOUTHWESTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 815 PM CST... At 744 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westlake, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Iowa, Fenton, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Moss Bluff, Buller, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Leblanc, Holmwood, and Lacassine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 23 and 51. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
